unnormalised: Refer to Dr. Sharma at AIIMS Delhi, Oncology dept, for further evaluation; patient was diagnosed with Stage 2 cancer on 10/08/2023 per biopsy report. Treatment plan includes 6 cycles of chemo followed by radiation therapy as per NCI guidelines.
normalised: Refer to Doctor Sharma at A-I-I-M-S Delhi, Oncology department, for further evaluation; patient was diagnosed with Stage two cancer on tenth august two thousand and twenty three per biopsy report. Treatment plan includes six cycles of chemo followed by radiation therapy as per N-C-I guidelines.
